name: The Invincible Mikey's Perfect Birthday!!
description:
★ ☆ ★

August 20 is an important day, marked with a bright red marker in Draken’s calendar.

There is no explanation written next to it - there’s no need. Even without the reminder, Draken would never forget such an important event.

And this year he sets himself a goal.

To make Mikey - Sano Manjiro, his boyfriend - as happy as possible on his birthday.

★ ☆ ★

The Invincible Mikey's Perfect Birthday!! is a short Tokyo Revengers fangame, created by a group of enthusiastic fans of Mikey and Draken.

★ ☆ ★

  • Art: Erumi (sprites, BGs, CG) and Addy (silhouette sprites)
  • Script: Jikkyuu and Catnoodlez
  • Programming: Red, Erumi and Jikkyuu
  • UI: SomeAntagonist and Erumi
  • Proofreading: Raven
  • Music: Tim Beek
